channel.title: Castle Wars
channel.description:
ok ive added castle wars to my server,
just 1 thing i need to know how to do..
how do i make it so when u go in guthix portal it will randomly choose a side or make it go on the side which has the least people.
atm when u go into a zammy portal it just makes zammyteam = true; and sarateam = true;
so how would i make it go randomly between those 2?

item.title: Castle Wars
item.dc:creator: @devildude797 devildude797
item.description:
@devildude797 wrote:

i would just delete the guth portal and add some sort of code to make it so there are even teams.

Read full topic
